name: Fresh Green Peas With Pearl Onions
keywords: onion, peas, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 red sweet pepper, cored and seeded and cut into 1/4-inch cubes
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place unpeeled onions in a small saucepan, cover with water and bring to a boil. Drain. Let cool, then peel.
Combine all ingredients in a small heavy saucepan with a tight-fitting cover. Add 3 tablespoons of water, bring to a boil and simmer over low heat for 10 minutes. Do not overcook.
